DOC.brief_summary: The CARD study is a observational study which includes Chinese adolescents with diabetes aged 18-30. The study aims to explore the status of disease treatment, self-management, the relationship between disease treatment and disease outcome in Chinese adolescents with diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: Chinese Adolescent Registry for Diabetes (CARD) Study
DOC.criteria: diagnosed diabetes aged 1430 signed the informed consent taking part in other drug research gestational diabetes diagnosed with tumor or cardiovascular disease
